Module WitchHunt

Package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies

package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies
This package's purpose is to propose an all-in-one set of tools used to define CPU-controlled players' artificial intelligences,
See Also:
  • Based on the Strategy design pattern
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players
    This package contains all elements defining the players, their possible actions within the game and the notifications they can send towards the view level of the MVC architecture.
  • Class
    Description
    CardValue
    This class represents the value attributed to a Rumour card by a SINGLE CPU Player's strategy.
    CardValueMap
    Associates each instance of Rumour card with a Card value for a SINGLE CPUPlayer's chosen chosen strategy.
    CPUStrategy
    Concrete CPU strategy.
    DefensiveStrategy
    This strategy will be chosen by the CPUPlayer when they feel threatened : If the game is tied, if the leading players are far above in score, if this player has no cards left, or if this player plays as a witch and is not close to victory.
    GropingStrategy
    The initial strategy of all CPU-controlled players, and the one adopted when the situation is not clear enough to choose a more angular strategy.
    OffensiveStrategy
    This strategy will be chosen by the CPUPlayer if they are in good position (score close to 5, well ranked, or has a lot of cards).
    PlayStrategy
